alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 5:44AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cameron, western Jefferson Davis, southeastern Beauregard, eastern Calcasieu and southern Allen Parishes through 615 AM CST... At 544 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gillis to near Sabine National Wildlife. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Cameron, Westlake, Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Fenton, Reeves, Grand Lake, Moss Bluff, Ragley, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Sabine National Wildlife, Hacketts Corner, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Holly Beach and Leblanc. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 18 and 50. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron
